meanings.definition: The process of forming a cyclic compound from a linear compound.
meanings.sent1: The cyclization of the molecules resulted in the formation of a ring structure.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study cyclization to understand how rings are created in chemistry.
meanings.sent3: During the experiment, the cyclization process seemed like magic turning a line into a circle.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a cyclization of ideas, weaving them together into a beautiful pattern.
meanings.sent5: The cyclization of the paper clip made it into a unique piece of art.

meanings.definition: The act of creating a ring structure in a chemical compound.
meanings.sent1: Chemists use cyclization to form circular shapes in molecules.
meanings.sent2: The cyclization of the compound led to the discovery of a new ring structure.
meanings.sent3: The cyclization process in the lab looked like a tiny dance of atoms forming a ring.
meanings.sent4: His words were a cyclization of thoughts, circling around a central idea.
meanings.sent5: The cyclization of the necklace transformed it into a symbol of unity.
